definition[0]: if your eyes glaze over, they show no expression, usually because you are very bored or tired
example[0]: Sometimes his eyes would glaze over for a second or two.
definition[1]: to cover plates, cups etc made of clay with a thin liquid that gives them a shiny surface
definition[2]: to cover food with a liquid which gives it an attractive shiny surface
example[1]: Glaze the rolls with egg white.
definition[3]: to fit glass into window frames in a house, door etc
definition[4]: a liquid that is used to cover plates, cups etc made of clay to give them a shiny surface
definition[5]: a liquid which is put onto food to give it an attractive shiny surface
definition[6]: a transparent covering of oil paint spread over a painting
